analysis.key_quote: I believe the reclassification of the career civil service employees will undermine the long record of a professional and honest civil service that is one of the underpinnings of a American democracy and effectiveness.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the undermining of professional civil service and the potential politicization of scientific processes, which aligns with themes of merit-based systems and integrity.
